list_definition.definition: to put, use etc (a person, thing etc), or to be put, used etc, in place of another

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I must replace that broken lock
He replaced the cup he broke with a new one
Cars have replaced horses as the normal means of transport.

list_definition.definition: to put (something) back where it was

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Please replace the books on the shelves.
